Text: dis shit is da bomb - right Thorne?

I saw CVB live in Tijuana.  Can't remember the year (85??), and only remember bits-n-pieces of that evening in Mexico... but I do remember that they did an INCREDIBLE show.

Victor (bass) was a very cool guy; and likely still is, if still breathing...

D
ABSOLUTLY AWESOME!!!! CANT WAIT TO HERE THIS 1!!! THX!
